name: StarBlink
description:
Protect the planets from Bob the destroyer of worlds! Fight off the nasty monsters that threat the planets using your awesome weapons. 

Discover 10 different weapons and 4 different enemies, that conclude in an epic boss fight! Will you be able to protect the planets and stop Bob's wrath? 

Made in under a week for BTP Game Jam #2

Music made by Fatal Exit:

| https://soundcloud.com/fatalexit | https://fatal-exit.itch.io/
